en.title: Dealing with Cat Night Crying: Causes and Effective Solutions
en.content:
When your cat keeps crying throughout the night, it can be distressing for both you and your neighbors. Understanding the causes of nighttime crying will help you respond appropriately.

Common Causes of Night Crying

Possible causes include hunger, boredom (insufficient exercise during the day), being in heat, litter box issues, health problems (especially cognitive dysfunction in senior cats), separation anxiety, and environmental changes.

Effective Solutions

Play actively with your cat before bedtime to burn off energy, feed them right before bed, have them neutered or spayed, provide a comfortable sleeping spot, and increase daytime activity. These measures can be very effective.

Important Notes

If you respond to night crying by giving your cat attention, they may learn that "crying gets me attention." After confirming your cat is safe, ignoring the behavior can also be important. However, if night crying starts suddenly, it could indicate a health issue, so consult your veterinarian.

zh.title: 猫咪夜间嚎叫的应对方法：原因与有效解决方案
zh.content:
猫咪深夜持续嚎叫，不仅主人困扰，邻居也会受到影响。了解夜间嚎叫的原因，才能采取正确的应对措施。

夜间嚎叫的主要原因

可能的原因包括：饥饿、无聊（白天运动不足）、发情期、猫砂盆问题、身体不适（尤其是老年猫的认知障碍）、分离焦虑以及环境变化等。

有效的应对方法

睡前充分陪猫咪玩耍消耗精力、临睡前喂食、进行绝育手术、准备一个安心舒适的睡窝、增加白天的活动量等方法都很有效。

注意事项

如果猫咪一叫就去理它，它会学到“只要叫就能获得关注”。在确认猫咪安全的前提下，适当忽视也很重要。但如果猫咪突然开始夜间嚎叫，可能是身体不适的表现，建议及时就诊。
